item.title: Web Dev is Hard
item.description: Do you ever encounter a task that's kind of tedious, and you realize you know some way to make it go faster, only to spend way longer automating it than it would've taken in the first place? Hi, this is the programmer bunny speaking! The site you're reading here is written in Hugo. Hugo is a tool/ framework/ thingamajig that lets you generate static HTML from Markdown files, manage content formatting, and some other things I don't feel like getting into.

item.title: Artwork
item.description: Artwork I'm a digital artist, for the most part. I've been drawing all my life, but I only got a tablet sometime around about 2011 or 2012? That's when I really got serious about improving my art skills. Right now I'm using an XP-Pen tablet and Clip Studio Paint to draw. These are drawings I did starting from mid-2022. If you'd like to see more, check out my social media pages.

item.title: B.U.D.D.
item.description: B.U.D.D. Eris using her first BUDD, Boxer, on Planet Verdeo. BUDD is a retro sci-fi adventure platformer game I've been working on since 2021! It's loosely inspired by retro SEGA games I loved, like Monster World IV or the Phantasy Star games. It stars Eris, a rookie bounty hunter that's found herself in the wrong place at the wrong time. She needs to use friendly robots called BUDDs to help her repair her ship, finish jobs for her colony, and then eventually uncover a conspiracy spanning the entire Lumina System.

item.title: Site Update Archive
item.description: Site Update Archive 09/17/24 - Undergoing a HEAVY rework of the website! Here are some things to keep in mind: The site's now on http://engineerkappa.net/! I decided to move from Neocities to GitHub Pages because git's honestly way easier to sync files with. Moving the site's content from pure HTML pages to Markdown documents via the Hugo framework. This should make it significantly easier for me to add new stuff to the site!
